languages.text: {n}Энрих задумчиво перекатывает папиросу во рту.{/n} "Я тоже видел его на некоторых переборках, ящиках, дверях. Я всегда думал, что это знак какого-то мелкого клана — многие пустотники метят своими родовыми символами рабочие места".

{n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."
languages.original_text: {n}Энрих задумчиво перекатывает папиросу во рту.{/n} "Я тоже видел его на некоторых переборках, ящиках, дверях. Я всегда думал, что это знак какого-то мелкого клана — многие пустотники метят своими родовыми символами рабочие места".

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

{n}Einrich rolls his cigarette back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I have, yes, on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I think there were a few even in this compartment. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

{n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

{n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

languages.text: {n}Einrich se pasa el cigarrillo entre los dedos, pensativo.{/n} «Sí, también lo he visto en algunas mamparas, cajas y puertas. Di por sentado que sería la marca de algún clan menor; muchas personas del vacío marcan su lugar de trabajo con símbolos familiares».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich se pasa el cigarrillo entre los dedos, pensativo.{/n} «Sí, también lo he visto en algunas mamparas, cajas y puertas. Di por sentado que sería la marca de algún clan menor; muchas personas del vacío marcan su lugar de trabajo con símbolos familiares».

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは、アイホスティックを前後に動かして考える。{/n}「えぇ、見たことはあります。隔壁や木箱、扉でいくつか見かけました。どこか小さな一族の印ではないでしょうか…多くのヴォイズマンが、仕事場に家族のシンボルの印をつけるんですよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは、アイホスティックを前後に動かして考える。{/n}「えぇ、見たことはあります。隔壁や木箱、扉でいくつか見かけました。どこか小さな一族の印ではないでしょうか…多くのヴォイズマンが、仕事場に家族のシンボルの印をつけるんですよ」

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇把玩着手里的麻烟，仔细思索着。{/n}“我也在船舱、板条箱、门上见过这样的符号。我一直以为这是某个小型氏族的印记，许多船员都会在他们的工作场所画上他们的氏族标志。”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇把玩着手里的麻烟，仔细思索着。{/n}“我也在船舱、板条箱、门上见过这样的符号。我一直以为这是某个小型氏族的印记，许多船员都会在他们的工作场所画上他们的氏族标志。”

languages.text: {n}Einrich rollt seinen Lho-Stab nachdenklich hin und her.{/n} "Ja, auf einigen Schotten, Kisten, Türen. Ich hatte einfach angenommen, dass es sich um das Zeichen eines kleinen Clans handelt. Viele Raumfahrer markieren ihre Arbeitsplätze mit dem Symbol ihrer Familie."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich rollt seinen Lho-Stab nachdenklich hin und her.{/n} "Ja, auf einigen Schotten, Kisten, Türen. Ich hatte einfach angenommen, dass es sich um das Zeichen eines kleinen Clans handelt. Viele Raumfahrer markieren ihre Arbeitsplätze mit dem Symbol ihrer Familie."

languages.text: {n}Songeur, Einrich fait rouler son cigalho d'avant en arrière.{/n} « Je l'ai également vu ici sur certaines cloisons, caisses et portes. J'ai cru qu'il s'agissait simplement de la marque d'un clan secondaire ; c'est une pratique commune chez les cosmomarins que d'orner leur lieu de travail de symboles familiaux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."

traits.locale_text: {n}Songeur, Einrich fait rouler son cigalho d'avant en arrière.{/n} « Je l'ai également vu ici sur certaines cloisons, caisses et portes. J'ai cru qu'il s'agissait simplement de la marque d'un clan secondaire ; c'est une pratique commune chez les cosmomarins que d'orner leur lieu de travail de symboles familiaux. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich, liho dalını bir ileri bir geri sararak düşünüyor.{/n} "Ayrıca birkaç bölme panelinin, sandığın ve kapının üzerinde de gördüm. Küçük bir klanın işareti olduğunu varsaydım. Pek çok uçsuz eri, çalışma alanını aile sembolleriyle işaretler."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich rolls his lho-stick back and forth, thinking.{/n} "I've also seen it on some bulkheads, crates, doors. I just assumed it was the mark of some small clan — many voidsmen mark their workplaces with family symbols."
